name: numbingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you not able to feel something, either physically or emotionally: numbingly cold The water was numbingly cold once the sun had gone down. I got so bored with the numbingly banal dialogue in the novel that I had to stop reading it.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is a long, boring, and numbingly repetitive film that could have done with a good edit.So many modern computer games are numbingly violent. The work is numbingly hard, with long hours and poor pay.
